outputs.output_descr:
Controle des Armes Legeres (ALPC) et Desarmement Civil au Burundi.

Activites: base de donnees sur les ALPC, site de destruction des armes, rehabilitation des armureries de la police et de l'armee.

Relocation of military personnel in army barracks to reduce the instances of violations of the rights of civilians by military personnel and to create a basis for a professional army that respects the rule of law.
Recensement de la police nationale burundaise

Le projet vise à permettre à la PNB de contribuer à la consolidation de la paix par la mise en place d'une police de proximité administrée de façon transparente, oeuvrant dans le respect de l'Etat de droit et dotée d'équipements individuels.

Netherlands contribution to relocation of military personnel in army barracks to reduce the instances of violations of the rights of civilians by military personnel and to create a basis for a professional army that respects the rule of law.

project_descr: Security Sector Reform and Small Arms activities to be funded by UNDP/BCPR and implemented within BINUB SSR-SA Section
project_title: Security Sector Reform  & Small Arms Joint Programme
